title.en: Evolution from Carp to Divine Dragon

altTitles.zh: 灵气复苏：从鲤鱼进化成神龙！

description.en: Photographer Lin Hao was attacked and killed by monster while on a shooting mission in Lin tian Ancient City. After being reborn, he found that he had become a koi carp

altTitles.en: Martial Art: Future's Ten Thousand Years

altTitles.zh-ro: Gao Wu: Denglu Weilai Yi Wan Nian

altTitles.es-la: Subiendo de nivel 10.000 años en el futuro

description.en: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!
description.pt-br: No início do dao marcial, bestas anormais invadiram o mundo. As artes marciais da humanidade tiveram que recuar derrota após derrota. Lu Sheng transmigra para aquela época, mas em seus sonhos ele entra em um mundo 10 mil anos depois. O método fundamental de refino do corpo de 10 mil anos no futuro é milhares de vezes mais eficaz do que o atual. Depois, há o método de respiração, a fórmula da pílula para refinar o corpo e a ordem marcial sagrada de 10 mil anos depois… Apesar de desenvolver artes marciais por 10 mil anos, a humanidade foi aniquilada! Sua civilização de artes marciais atingiu o ápice, e ainda assim não sobrou ninguém para herdá-la. Exceto Lu Sheng, ele é a última centelha de esperança!
description.zh-hk: 武道初兴之时，恐怖的异兽入侵，人类武者节节败退。陆圣穿越而来，在梦中进入一万年后的世界—— 一万年后的基础炼体术，经过改版，效果是现在的几千倍！一万年后的呼吸法、炼体药方、武学圣典…… 武道一万年，人类灭绝。 繁衍至巅峰的武道文明，却再无人可继承。 陆圣，便是那唯一的火种！

altTitles.ja: ハジメテノサツジン

description.en: "We are murderers, you know."  Mayu is your average high school girl who goes to a prestigious school for young ladies. Her school life there feels fulfilling thanks to her close friends, Oto and Yuu.  However, one day, Mayu and Yuu witnessed Oto pushing their class teacher who then fell and lost consciousness. Oto tries to explain that the latter has only passed out but...!?

title.en: I Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off The Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

description.en:
**Pain Perception 0, Capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'.
I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off.

Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace.

Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally ill hero throwing herself for the world!

I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!

Gardens, isolated from the world, home to the mystical. What resides within their walls? Gods and deities? Charming vixen spirits? Ghouls and apparitions? An amalgamation of fiends, demons, beasts, and spectres, the Mystic Gardens descend and stir the world into chaos. Amidst countless creations and endless dangers, can the millions struggling to survive within the Gardens construct a safe haven for themselves?

altTitles.ja: だらしないです 堀田先生！

description.en: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?

title.en: I'm Stuck on the Same Day for a Thousand Years

altTitles.en: I’m Trapped in This Day for One Thousand Years

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Bèi Kùn Zài Tóngyī Tiān Yīqiān Nián

altTitles.zh: 我被困在同一天一千年

description.en:
Wu Chen transmigrated to a new world, Got trapped on the day of July 7, 2020, Constantly reincarnating! He used to indulge himself doing all sorts of evil things while running wild in despair, but every new day, everything would start all over again. In this way, he has been reincarnated for a thousand years, and on a new day, the sun rose as usual.
——The time is: July 8, 2020

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: クールな同級生の◯◯年後...

altTitles.en: The Cool Classmate XX Years Later...

description.en: The intelligent Hong Danwoo who also is an introvert, has a secret that’s also a problem… He’s unable to get a haircut! But that isn’t the only issue… He’s broke. So, in search of a job, Danwoo finds himself at a small hair salon where he meets a remarkably attractive hairstylist, Kwon Tae-han. A fateful occurrence unfolds when Dan-woo can't help but feel an intense sensation from Tae-Han’s skillful touch while he’s getting his haircut. Unable to hold back his feelings towards the touching, he says,“ Um… When you touch my head, it feels like this…”In the end, Dan-woo decides to confess his little problem with Taehan expecting to receive judgment, Taehan offers to help him instead of thinking he’s some kind of pervert. In order to become a better version of himself, Dan-woo starts up secret training sessions with Taehan. But little does he know, these hidden training sessions become more than just training sessions.
description.es-la: Peluquero Coqueto X Nerd Sensible. ¡Cómo puede ser que la zona erógena de alguien sea su cuero cabelludo/cabello...! Hong Dan-woo es un chico extremadamente introvertida que no tiene ni un solo amigo porque su zona erógena es el cuero cabelludo/cabello. Un día, su jefe a tiempo parcial le dice que se corte el pelo por el bien de su larga melena, ¡así que se arma de valor y va a una peluquería unipersonal a cortarse el pelo...!

title.en: I, the Demon Lord, Am Being Targeted by My Female Disciples!

altTitles.zh: 大爱魔尊，女徒弟都想杀我

altTitles.zh-ro: Da Ai Mo Zun, Nv Tu Di Dou Xiang Sha Wo
Dà Ài Mó Zūn, Nǚ Tú Dì Dōu Xiǎng Shā Wǒ

altTitles.es: ¡Yo, el Señor de los Demonios, soy el blanco de mis discípulas!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu, o Lorde Demônio, Estou Sendo Alvo De Minhas Discípulas!

description.en: Bai Feng transmigrated into an ancient chinese style dating game and became the Demon Lord, Bai Qingling. The Bai Qingling in the game is cold-hearted and ruthless. In order to seek immortality, he cultivates the Path of Gu, makes human puppets, and does all kinds of evil. What’s even more hateful is that his three stunning female disciples he regards as pawns, are the villain bosses in the game’s “Pure Love” and “Evil Fall” routes! In such a desperate situation, let’s see how Bai Feng can turn the tables with the [Great Love System]!
description.zh: 白枫穿越国风恋爱游戏，成了魔道巨擘，白青凌。游戏中的白青凌，腹黑冷酷，为求长生，修蛊道、炼人傀、无恶不为。　更可恨的是，他一直将三名收养的绝色女弟子，视作棋子，是游戏「纯爱」、「恶堕」路线中，共同的反派大boss！ 如此绝境中看白枫如何凭借【大爱系统】逆转翻盘！
description.pt-br: Bai Feng viaja pelo jogo do amor chinês e se torna o mestre da magia, Bai Qingling. Bai Qingling no jogo é sombrio e insensível. Para buscar a imortalidade, ele pratica Gu Tao, refina fantoches humanos e pratica todo tipo de mal. O que é ainda mais odioso é que ele sempre considerou as três impressionantes discípulas adotadas como peões, os chefes vilões comuns nas rotas “Pure Love” e “Evil Fall” do jogo! Em uma situação tão desesperadora, veja como Bai Feng pode virar o jogo com o [Grande Sistema de Amor]!

altTitles.ja: The Comic Artist And His Assistants
マンガ家さんとアシスタントさんと

description.en:
A Life Description about the Mangaka Aito Yuuki and his Assistant Ashisu Sahoto.  
Aito-san doesn't understand the feelings of the characters on his stories. So He asks Ashisu to help him. Ashisu would do everything for the work. She would even let him touch her breast so he will know how it feels like?!  
  
The Habit?! The Pervert?! Can we understand them? That's the Comedy of a Mangaka Life.

The mangaka alternates between the standard style and the 4koma.  

---

**Links:**  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15793)
description.ru: Жизнь описание мангака Айто Юки и его помощницы Ашису Сахото. Айто-сан не понять чувства героев его рассказов. Поэтому он просит Ашису, чтобы помочь ему. Ашису сделает все для работы. Она бы даже даст пощупать ее собственной груди так он будет знать, как она чувствует, как?! Привычка?! Извращенце?! Мы можем их понять? Это комедия о мангака жизни.
description.pt-br: A história desse mangá descreve sobre a vida do mangaka Aito Yuuki e de sua assistente Ashisu Sahoto. Aito-san não entende os sentimentos dos personagens de suas histórias. Então ele pede para Ashisu ajudá-lo. Ashisu faria tudo pelo trabalho. Ela poderia até mesmo deixar ele tocar em seus próprios seios para que ele sinta como é.

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

altTitles.ja: ラブ・らっきぃ

description.en: Fuuta is an average-looking salaryman who's never had luck with women. However, all that changes when he meets a strange girl through a dating agency. She's nice, but has an odd habit of always wearing masks on their dates. One day, Fuuta sees his mask-wearing girlfriend being attacked by (what he thinks are) thieves. Fuuta saves her from them, and full of happiness and gratitude, the girl confesses and proposes to him. The night they get married, she finally takes off her mask and reveals her identity: She's the super-idol singer Kirari who Fuuta admires! Thus starts their life as a married couple.

title.en: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~

altTitles.ja: 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

altTitles.ja: ハレンチ学園

description.en:
The first ecchi in history.

Beginning in the first issue of Weekly Shonen Jump (ch 2). The nature of the content is very extreme with both teachers and students being involved in perverted situations. Over the publication, Go Nagai included more extreme content at the encouragement of his editor. As the manga continued its serialization, it garnered more and more controversy from parents. As a result, the Jump Editorial Dept. decided to cancel the serial. 

Nagai, in response to the controversy, decided to end off the manga [End of part 1] with the very infamous "Harenchi War" (Shameless War) arc.

_(spoiler)
The arc kills off the majority of the cast in a very gory and disturbing manner and remains a very infamous arc to this day._


Shameless School is controversial in Japan even today and is regarded as a "traumatic work" by several news publications.

The manga consists of 3 parts, with the last left unfinished due to the cancellation. + last volume includes 3 chapters backstory arc for Bearded Godzilla.

title.en: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu: Mou Hitori no Seijo

altTitles.ja: 聖女の魔力は万能です ～もう一人の聖女～

altTitles.en: The Saint's Magic Power Is Omnipotent: The Other Saint
The Power of the Saint is All Around: The Other Saint

description.en: Aira Misono is a run-of-the-mill high school girl, and never imagined that she’d be summoned to another world, let alone declared its savior. Yet from the moment the handsome Prince Kyle lays eyes on her, he’s convinced that she’s the long-awaited Holy Saint destined to banish darkness from his world. Aira herself maintains significant doubts. Is she really up to this challenge? She might be able to use magic, but is she really a Saint? Aira’s fears and struggles only deepen when the woman summoned alongside her begins to look more and more like the one who truly deserves that title.

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện cổ tích về người mẹ kế
Cổ tích về một người mẹ kế

altTitles.es: El cuento de hadas de una madrastra

altTitles.ja: ある継母のメルヘン

altTitles.zh-ro: Mou Ge Jimu De Tonghua Gushi

altTitles.th: เทพนิยายของแม่เลี้ยงชูริ

altTitles.pt-br: O Conto de Fadas de uma Madrasta

description.en:
The Iron Widow, the Spider Widow, the Male Hunter, the Witch of the Neuschwanstein Castle, the embarrassment of noble ladies… These were all the words used to describe the Marchioness Shuli von Neuschwanstein. Despite receiving such harsh criticism from everyone, she persisted in raising her 'children,' left behind from her late husband. On the day of her eldest son's wedding, signaling his possession of the family's seat as Marquess, she felt she had finally tied up all loose ends and could live the rest of her life out peacefully. However, she had been terribly mistaken as she finds herself getting caught up in an accident and dying whilst leaving the castle on his wedding day. Upon opening her eyes, she finds herself waking up to the day of her husband's funeral, seven years ago.

'I refuse to suffer any more. I won’t live as I did in the past a second time!'

---
Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-fantasie-of-a-stepmother/info)
* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6585/)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/merveilleuse-maratre)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/A-Stepmothers-Marchen/3313)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/41993)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/เทพนิยายของแม่เลี้ยงชูริ/199)
description.es:
La viuda de hierro, la viuda araña, la cazadora de hombres, la bruja del Castillo Neuschwanstein, la vergüenza de las damas de la nobleza… Estos eran los términos usados para describir a la Marquesa Shuli von Neuschwanstein. A pesar de recibir tan duras críticas de todos, ella persistió en criar a sus 'hijos', dejados a su cargo por su difunto esposo. En el día de la boda de su hijo mayor, en la que él tomó posesión del título familiar de Marqués, ella sintió que por fin había atado todos esos cabos sueltos y que por fin podría vivir su vida pacíficamente. Sin embargo, se equivocó de sobremanera, pues se halla víctima de un accidente mortal en el momento de su partida de dicha boda. Al abrir sus ojos, se halla despertando el día mismo del funeral de su esposo, siete años atrás.

'Me rehuso a sufrir más. ¡No viviré como viví en el pasado por segunda vez!'

---

description.fr:
Belle-mère à la rescousse! Mariée à l'âge de quatorze ans à un vieux noble rapidement décédé, elle se retrouve à devoir s'occuper de ses quatre beaux-enfants à peine plus jeunes qu'elle. Des années plus tard, ces derniers la détestent à cause des choix qu'elle a dû faire pour les protéger... Soudain, une seconde chance s’offre à elle! Saura-t-elle ne pas répéter les mêmes erreurs?

---

description.id:
Shuri baru berusia 16 tahun saat ditinggal mati Yohanes Neuwanstein, suaminya. Tidak hanya harta berlimpah, mendiang suaminya juga meninggalkan empat anak tiri, Jeremy, Elias, serta si kembar Rachel dan Leon, yang lebih cocok jadi adik Shuri!

---

description.ja:
『神様、こんなの…あんまりです…!』

田舎の無名家門に生まれたシュリーは、貧しい家族の企みでノイヴァンシュタイン侯爵の元へ嫁がされる。
でも、侯爵が亡くなって…いきなり4人の子どもの継母に――!?
『鉄血の未亡人』と非難されながらも必死に当主としての役目を果たしついに迎えた長男・ジェレミーの結婚式の日――。
継母としての務めを終え、新たな人生を始めようと馬車に乗ったはずなのに…7年前の侯爵の葬儀の日に逆戻り!!
周囲に敵ばかりだったシュリーの2度目の継母ライフはいかに……?

---

description.ko:
철혈의 미망인, 거미 과부, 남자 사냥꾼,
노이반슈타인 성의 마녀, 귀부인들의 수치…….

모두 슈리 폰 노이반슈타인 후작 부인을 가리키는 말이다.
세상에 욕 먹어 가며 동생뻘인 피 한 방울 섞이지 않은 자식들을 키워냈다.

그리고 마침내 첫째 제레미의 결혼식 날,
모든 고생과 노력이 결실을 맺는 날이라 생각했다.
그러나 그것은 그녀의 엄청난 착각이었다.

결혼식에 오지 말라는 통보를 듣고
성을 떠나던 중, 사고에 휘말려 목숨을 잃게 된 것이다.

그런데 눈을 떠보니, 칠 년 전 죽은 남편의 장례식 날로 돌아왔다.

더 이상 개고생은 사양이다.
두 번 다시 예전처럼 살지 않으리라!

---

description.zh:
铁血遗孀,蜘蛛寡妇,诺斯坦城的魔女,贵妇们的耻辱。这些都是暗指施里诺斯坦侯爵夫人。 她一边挨骂,一边培养着没有一滴血缘关系的弟弟辈子女。在长子的婚礼那天，她卷入事故而失去了生命。 再睁开眼,时间又回到七年丈夫的葬礼那天，这次，她不会再像从前那样生活了！

altTitles.ja: 徒然チルドレン

description.en: A manga about kids going through a year of High School. Watch as they go through the high and lows of relationships and learn a few things about life, love, and sushi while they're at it.
description.pt-br: Uma série 4-koma descrevendo vários cenários do amor de jovens. Estes contos variam de um garoto, incapacitado por sua absoluta falta de confiança em si mesmo, não pode sequer aceitar o fato de que a garota de seus sonhos, na verdade, pediu-lhe para saírem em uma encontro, até uma garota quase psicótica que derrama o próprio sangue em seu chocolate caseiro, a fim de ganhar o coração de seu amado.

title.en: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei - Irotoutoshi-hen

altTitles.ja: ひぐらしのなく頃に令 色尊し編

description.en: Sequel to Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Hoshiwatashi-hen and Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Oniokoshi-hen.

altTitles.ja: Otokojyuku Gaiden Date Omito

description.en: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Date Omito.

title.en: In the Name of Bai Ze

description.en: Several decades ago, the young boy Bai Ze mistakenly entered a mystical world's immortal mountain and formed a bond with an Immortal Gege. Over ten years later, the college student Baize once again arrives in the mystical realm, only to discover that the Immortal Gege he had dreamed of day and night has become a pitiable figure forgotten by the mortal world. In a world where demons and monsters wreak havoc, the unfortunate originator turns out to be this pitiful divine being. Unable to ignore the situation, Bai Ze forcefully brings his Immortal Gege back into the mortal realm, helping him fulfill his desire for a peaceful life. After all, who could resist someone so beautiful, powerful yet pitiful?
description.pl: Młody chłopiec o imieniu Bai Ze przypadkiem wszedł do mistycznego świata, w którym normalne było potwory i bóstwa. Zaprzyjaźnił się tam z przystojnym nieśmiertelnym mężczyzną, lecz musiał wracać do rodziców. Ponad dziesięć lat później Bai Ze ponownie trafia do tajemniczego wymiaru, gdzie odkrywa, że poznane uprzednio bóstwo, o którym śnił nocami i dniami, stało się zapomnianą przez wszystkich postacią. Nie będąc w stanie tego zignorować, Bai Ze siłą zabiera go do swojego świata, pomagając mu spełnić marzenie o spokojnym życiu.
description.zh: 十数年前，小正太白泽误入异世仙山，与神仙大哥哥结缘。 十数年后，大学生白泽再次来到异世，却发现日思夜梦的神仙大哥哥成了被人世遗忘的可怜人 世间妖魔作乱，始作俑者却就是这个可怜兮兮的神仙。 没办法，白泽硬拉着神仙哥哥重新入世，帮他完成安稳世间的愿望，谁让他又美又强又惨呢？

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to

altTitles.ja: エルフとバイクと帝国地理調査員と

altTitles.en: Elf and Bike and Imperial Geographic Surveyor and…

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女育成計画restart

description.en: 16 Magical Girls have been chosen to participate in the Magical Girl Raising Project by an unknown person and this time, there's prize money involved. Every three days, their Magical Phones will pull them into an RPG-like simulation where they have to clear the game to get out!

altTitles.ja: ヘルシング

altTitles.en: Hellsing: The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of the Vampire Hunter

description.en:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---
description.es: La familia Van Helsing ha sido la némesis del conde Drácula y de toda la raza de vampiros.Ahora se ha convertido en toda una organización cuyo mejor cazador,un vampiro,usará el humor y la violencia para cumplir su destino...y ha dado origen a una exitosa serie de animación.
description.fr: En Angleterre, l'organisation secrète Hellsing agit pour protéger le pays des forces du mal, dont les vampires. Force de frappe de l'Église protestante, ce groupe dispose d'une arme secrète des plus inattendues: Alucard, vampire surpuissant et apparemment invulnérable. Mais leur mission se corsera quand ils devront faire face au Vatican et aux brigades anti-monstres de l'État le plus petit du monde...
description.hu: A Hellsing Királyi Protestáns Lovagrend az Angol Korona évszázados szervezete – egy család, amelynek a feladata a birodalom védelme a természetfeletti és istentelen veszedelmektől. A lovagrend lelke Sir Integra Wingates Hellsing, legfőbb fegyvere pedig Alucard, a szervezet szolgálatában álló titokzatos ősvámpír, valamint – újabban – Seras Victoria, egy balul elsült bevetésen született vámpírlány.
description.it: Londra, un'antica casata nobiliare combatte contro i vampiri da generazioni; si tratta dell'agenzia segreta HELLSING, comandata da Lady Integra Farbuke Wingates Hellsing.Integra, succeduta alla morte del padre, stipula un patto di sangue con il on il vampiro Alucard e lo induce a battersi contro le tremende forze occulte che minacciano il pianeta, dando vita a una delle saghe horror più famose nel panorama dei manga.
description.ja: 幽霊船デメテル号に乗ってアーカードが遂に来た！かくして役者は全員演壇へと登り、暁の惨劇は幕を上げる・・・・・・
description.lt:
Kažkur Anglijoje gyvuoja slapta organizacija, sukurta tam, kad apgintų karalienę ir šalį nuo įvairiausio plauko pabaisų. Sveiki atvykę į paslaptingąjį Hellsing – organizaciją, kuri žino, kaip spręsti problemas, kai iš tamsos išnyra vampyrai, gūlai ir kitokios šlykštynės. Be to, organizacijos nariai gali pasigirti puikiu ginklu.

Klausiate, kokiu? Ogi kitu vampyru, kuris šimtmečius tobulino savąjį kovos meną ir todėl yra bemaž neįveikiamas. Apsiginklavęs milžinišku pistoletu, užtaisytu ypatingomis sidabrinėmis kulkomis, Alukardas kelia siaubą ne tik nemirėliams. Tačiau ne tai svarbiausia. Skaitytoją visų pirma priblokš kandus šių istorijų sąmojis, neįtikėtinos iliustracijos ir beprotiškai kruvinas veiksmas. Nenuostabu, jog ši manga užkariavo visą pasaulį.
description.pt: Para resolver o caso de um estranho pastor de hábitos macabros, é chamada a Organização Hellsing, responsável por livrar a Inglaterra dos males que espreitam na noite. Alucard é a principal arma da Hellsing contra estes seres, e sua história se cruza com a da novata Seras Victoria e a da chefe da organização, Integra Wingates Hellsing.
description.ru: Вампир Алукард - древний и могущественный, вампир "в самом расцвете сил". Все что его интересует - это поиски по-настоящему сильного противника. Убивать и умирать - какие еще могут быть развлечения в бессмертной жизни? И организация "Хеллсинг", члены которой посвятили себя борьбе с порождениями тьмы вроде него. Что может их связывать кроме желания уничтожить друг друга? Но, как ни странно, Алукард и Хеллсинг прекрасно работают вместе… и будут работать ровно до тех пор, пока древний вампир не найдет для себя действительно могущественного и интересного врага.
description.tr:
Hortlaklar, vampirler, canavarlar... Kraliyet Protestan Şövalyeler Kardeşliği, yani Hellsing, onlarla kadim zamanlardan beri mücadele ediyor. Nasıl mı? Tabii ki yüksek teknoloji ürünü silahlar ve ekipmanla... Üstelik bunları kullanan kişi tam bir vampir uzmanı. Hellsing sizi aksiyon ve kan yüklü bir dünyaya davet ediyor.

Bu sayıda Hellsing Organizasyonu'nun avlarıyla ve düşmanlarıyla tanışıyoruz. Hiç beklenmeyen bazı gelişmeler, Integra Hellsing'in tüm planlarını bozuyor. Üstelik, kurumun yakın geçmişinde yaşanan güç oyunları ve entrikalar da karşımıza çıkıyor. Bakalım Hellsing bütün bu olanlarla başa çıkabildi mi ve olacaklarla başa çıkabilecek mi?
description.es-la: Llega uno de los mayores éxitos de los últimos años! Hellsing, una organización auspiciada por el gobierno británico, controlada por la implacable Integra, busca exterminar a los despiadados vampiros, cuya actividad va en aumento y causa pánico en la población. Su principal arma es Alucard, un sádico vampiro liberado por Integra después de años de reclusión. Junto a él, Victoria Seras, una chica policía ahora mitad vampiro. El peligro? Una posible guerra mundial. Mucho más explícito, violento, humorístico y adulto que la serie de TV.

title.en: Being a Maid Is Better Than Being a Princess

altTitles.en: A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
It's Better to Be a Maid Than to Be a Princess

altTitles.es: Mi vocación era ser doncella, no princesa
Ser sirvienta es mejor que una princesa torturada

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Hầu Nữ Còn Quan Trọng Hơn Là Làm Công Chúa

altTitles.zh: 比起公主，侍女才是我的天职

description.en:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

altTitles.ja: 影姫　－KAGE HIME－

description.en:
The story follows Niimi Soichiro, a third-year art college student, who is dedicated to creating sculptures of beautiful breasts and seeking the ultimate beauty. One night, he is attacked by a yokai and meets Kagehime, a Shadow Princess who fights yokai. In order for Kagehime to operate in the human world, she needs a physical body, and Soichiro agrees to create one for her.

The series combines elements of comedy, fantasy, and action, with unique partnership between the eccentric art student and the adorable yokai.
description.ja: 諏訪美術大学３年・彫刻学科研究室の新美創一朗は美しいおっぱいを追求し、理想の女体を求めて作品を制作していたが、ある夜妖怪に襲われ、妖怪を退治する影姫と出会う。彼女が人間界で活動するには塑体が必要で創一朗は彼女の身体を作ることに!?

title.en: The Legend of Zelda - The Minish Cap

altTitles.ja: ゼルダの伝説 ふしぎのぼうし

altTitles.ja-ro: Zelda no Densetsu - Fushigi no Boushi

description.en: On the day of the Picori Festival, Link and Princess Zelda go to watch the sword-fighting tournament. The winner is a strange man named Vaati, who has come to claim the Light Force which is sealed within the Bound Chest. When the Light Force turns up missing, Vaati turns Princess Zelda to stone! To save his friend, Link needs the power of the Picori Blade, but only a certain master swordsmith can reforge it. Can Link find the pieces of the broken sword before Vaati does?
description.pt-br: Baseado no jogo de GBA. No dia do Festival Picori, Link e a Princesa Zelda vão assistir ao torneio de luta de espadas. O vencedor é um homem estranho chamado Vaati, que veio para reivindicar a Força da Luz que está selada dentro do Bound Chest. Quando a Força da Luz desaparece, Vaati transforma a Princesa Zelda em pedra! Para salvar sua amiga, Link precisa do poder da Picori Blade, mas apenas um certo mestre ferreiro pode reforjá-la. Link pode encontrar os pedaços da espada quebrada antes de Vaati?

altTitles.ja: 君は冥土様

description.en: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
description.id: ||Seorang gadis dengan pakaian pelayan datang ke rumah Hitoyoshi untuk mencari pekerjaan. Pekerjaan dia sebelumnya adalah seorang pembunuh, dan dia sangat ahli dalam semua teknik membunuh, tapi dia sangat awam dalam pekerjaan rumah. Hitoyoshi bingung dengan permintaan anehnya itu dan memintanya pergi. Tapi kemudian gadis itu menyelamatkan Hitoyoshi dari sebuah kecelakaan maut, dan Hitoyoshi pikir dia mungkin bisa mempekerjakannya? Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang pelayan yang dulunya adalah pembunuh berdarah dingin kini belajar tentang emosi baru. Seorang pelayan yang hidup kesepian di dunia bawah akhirnya menemukan keluarga. Awal kehidupan sehari-hari yang menyenangkan dimulai!||

altTitles.en: Sexy and Stupid Water Polo Comedy

altTitles.ja: ハンツー×トラッシュ

description.en: Hamaji Youhei, a freshman in high school, lives his life aimlessly, lazing around all day. He can't keep up with his studies, no good at sports and won't stick with anything for long. Besides that he's a pervert who's continuously rejected by girls. A sophomore convinces him into joining a club where he could lunge at girls, fondling and touching all he wanted. Thus he joined the Water Polo Club. Can Youhei, who never sticks with anything for long, find his place in this club?
description.pt:
Hamaji Youhei, é um calouro do colegial, uma vida sem rumo, sem fazer nada o dia todo. Ele não é bom nos estudos, nos esportes e não dura muito tempo em lugar nenhum. alem disso ele é um pervertido que está continuamente sendo rejeitados pelas garotas. um colegial do 2º ano convence ele a entrar em um clube onde pudesse agarrar as garotas, acariciando e tocando tudo o que ele quiser. Assim, ele se juntou ao Clube de Polo Aquático. Pode Youhei, que nunca dura em lugar nenhum por muito tempo, encontrar seu lugar nesse clube?  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/K_hiyokopiyo)

title.en: Capcom vs SNK: The King of Fighters vs Street Fighters
Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.en: Reborn as a Space Mercenary: I Woke Up Piloting the Strongest Starship!

altTitles.ja: 目覚めたら最強装備と宇宙船持ちだったので、一戸建て目指して傭兵として自由に生きたい

altTitles.ja-ro: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai

altTitles.zh: 一觉醒来坐拥神装和飞船，我决定以买一套独门独户的房子为目标作为佣兵自由地活下去

altTitles.zh-hk: 覺醒起來就持有最強裝備和宇宙飛船，所以我決定以買一個私人住宅為目標作為傭兵自由地活下去

altTitles.ru: Я очнулся, будучи пилотом сильнейшего космического корабля, а потому решил стать межгалактическим наёмником

altTitles.en: When I Woke Up, I Got the Strongest Equipment and a Starship, so I Went and Became a Mercenary in Order to Live as I Please while Aiming for a Detached House

description.en:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
description.ru: Это история о парне, неожиданно оказавшемся в открытом космосе с личным боевым кораблем. На этом космолёте он будет путешествовать, попутно спасать девушек, оказавшихся в беде, флиртовать с ними, зарабатывать деньги и использовать свои знания из игры, чтобы вести свободный и непринужденный образ жизни.

title.en: The Cause of the Dinosaurs’ Extinction～ＢＥＹＯＮＤ　ＴＨＥ　ＴＩＭＥ～

altTitles.ja: 恐竜が絶滅した理由～ＢＥＹＯＮＤ　ＴＨＥ　ＴＩＭＥ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyouryuu ga Zetsumetsu Shita Riyuu～ＢＥＹＯＮＤ　ＴＨＥ　ＴＩＭＥ～

altTitles.ja: アークナイツ OPERATORS!

description.en:
The popular four-panel comic strips from the official Arknights Twitter account have finally been collected into a book!

In addition to the individual episodes of the 22 operators, the stories "The Great Chief Returns", "Mansfield Break", "Under Tides", and other event comics are also included. This is a must-have book for fans, to help you find the operator who is just right for you!
description.pt-br: A história segue os membros do grupo Rhodes Island, um grupo criado com o propósito de proteger e ajudar pessoas infectadas com Oripatia. Acompanhe o dia a dia deles enquanto fazem seu trabalho.

title.en: What the Duke Picked up in the Forest

altTitles.en: The Duke Picked up Something in the Forest

altTitles.fr: Ce qui le duc ramassa dans la forêt

altTitles.es: El duque cogió algo en el bosque
Lo que el duque recogió en el bosque

description.en:
“I’m going to do this for the last time, so let me go back with my memories.”

Those who died for me 29 times... I wanted to protect you with my own hands at least once. I want to protect those poor and pitiful 'my people.'

Thus, Elysia's 30th and last regression began. Everything began to change as if fate had been twisted into place. A child who was born without a ‘sign’ in a family that received God’s protection and lived a harsh life. I gradually realize that the beginning of the curse disguised as God's blessing all started with one person...
description.fr: Élisia Creed est de retour dans son corps de 10 ans."Mais pourquoi à ce moment précis ?"La personne qui l'a sauvée, qui était presque la proie des chiens sauvages dans la forêt de minuit, est le duc Balne, le protagoniste de toutes sortes de rumeurs dangereuses.Elle a vécue 29 vies dans le malheur à cause de sa belle-mère, qui cherche désespérément à la tuer, et de son père froid et négligent. C'était la dernière chance que Dieu lui a donnée. Avec l'aide du duc, Élysia change son destin.
description.zh:
重生30次遇见危险公爵
这次要亲手改变不幸的命运
艾莉希雅·克雷德回来了！再一次回到了自己儿时的身体里。这倒不是坏事，可为什么偏偏回到了这个时间点啊？在午夜的森林里，有着各种危险传闻的瓦尔恩公爵，救了差点被一群野狗撕咬的她。因为绞尽脑汁想要夺走她的性命的继母，和对此冷眼旁观、放任不管的父亲，艾莉希雅过了29次悲惨的人生。这是神给予她的最后一次机会，这一次艾莉希雅在公爵的帮助之下，开始了改写自己命运的故事！

title.en: My Disciples Are All Big Villains

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Tudi Dou Shi Da Fanpai
Wǒ De Túdì Dōu Shì Dà Fǎnpài

altTitles.en: My Apprentices Are All Great Villains

description.en: Lu Zhou wakes up to become the world’s most powerful and oldest villainous Patriarch, and finds that he has nine notorious disciples who are full of evil. His eldest disciple is the leader of the Nether Sect with thousands of minions, and his second disciple—Sword Devil—always slaughters others at the slightest disagreement…
description.zh: 陆州一觉醒来成了世间最强大最老的魔头祖师爷，还有九个恶贯满盈，威震天下的徒弟。大徒弟幽冥教教主手下万千魔众，二徒弟剑魔一言不合就开杀戒…… 没了一身修为，如何调教这帮恶徒 大徒弟于正海：“老夫这一生所向披靡，除了师父他老人家，谁也别想骑我头上。” 七徒弟司无涯：“师父不死，我等寝食难安啊” ……

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me "Master"!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

title.en: I Tried Asking My Cool Girlfriend for a Favor

altTitles.ja-ro: Cool Kanojo ni Onegai Shite Mita

altTitles.ja: クール彼女にお願いしてみた

altTitles.en: I Tried asking a favor to my Cool Girlfriend

altTitles.ro: Am Încercat Să-i Cer o Favoare Iubitei Mele Cool

title.en: Master: This Villainous Disciple Is Not The Holy Child

altTitles.zh: 师尊：这个冲师逆徒才不是圣子

altTitles.zh-ro: Shi Zun: Zhege Chong Shi Nitu Cai Bushi Sheng Zi
Shī Zūn: Zhège Chōng Shī Nìtú Cái Bùshì Shèng Zǐ

altTitles.es-la: Maestra, este Discípulo Villano no puede ser el Hijo Sagrado
Este Discípulo Tan rebelde No Puede Ser un Discípulo Santo

description.en: A hundred years ago, Chu Xiu transmigrated from Earth to Cang Qiong Continent, and received the Destined Villain System. After killing countless holy sons and daughters, he was surrounded by the older generation, and self destructed, possessing Tai Su Sacred Ground Yun Xia Mountain’s senior disciple. This time, he decided to lay low and develop strength. Let’s start small, what about becoming a saint admired by thousands?
description.zh: 蓝星来的楚休百年前穿越到天穹大陆，绑定天命反派系统，斩圣地圣子生女无数，杀到同辈之中无敌。 最终，被老一辈强者围杀，自爆而亡，夺舍太素圣地云霞峰大弟子重生。 这一次，他决定“苟”起来，偷偷发育。 先定个小目标，成为一位万人敬仰的圣子如何？
description.es-la: Chu Xiu de la Estrella Azul viajó al Continente Celestial de hace cien años, atado al Sistema de Villanos del Destino Celestial, decapitó a innumerables discípulos y discípulas santos de la Tierra Sagrada y matando hasta el punto de ser invencible entre sus iguales. Al final, se vio rodeado por la vieja generación de personas poderosos, que lo terminó haciendo morir y renacer como el discípulo mayor del Pico Yunxia de la Tierra Sagrada de Taisu. Esta vez, decidió ser mas «perro» y desarrollarse en secreto. Primero se fijó un pequeño objetivo, «¿qué tal convertirse en un hijo santo admirado por millones de personas?»

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

altTitles.ja: となねこ

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.
description.ja:
**もっと知りたい きみのこと**
高校1年生・瀬野湊（せのみなと）。新学期早々に担任の教師から頼まれたのは、となりの席でいつも寝ている猫実（ねこざね）さんのこと。超人見知り&引っ込み思案な性格な瀬野…。会話どころか顔すら見たことがない猫実さんを勇気を出して起こそうとしたら、急に彼女から抱きつかれて――!?友達未満なふたりが紡ぐ、無自覚ラブコメ開幕♪

description.en: The demon queen was defeated by the dog I raised… I, who merely wanted to return to the countryside, was transmigrated into a foreign world. I managed to become a foundation level existence in a novice village. Even the demon queen, who dominated the world, was defeated by the dog I raised. From then on, the demon queen has lived in my house, and my adventures in aforeign world began.
description.zh: 女魔王被我养的一条狗给打败了......只想归隐田园的我，却意外来到了异世界，苟在新手村苟成创世级存在，连统治天下的女魔王都被我养的一条狗给打败了。从此，女魔王住在了我的家，异世界的冒险之旅从此开始。

altTitles.ja: ざぁこ♡ざぁこ♡ざこ勇者♡

title.en: I Became the Game's Biggest Villain

altTitles.zh: 网游：因为太浪，我成了全服公敌！

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǎngyóu: Yīnwèi Tài Làng, Wǒ Chéngle Quán Fú Gōngdí!
Wangyou: Yinwei Tai Lang, Wo Chengle Quan Fu Gongdi!

altTitles.en: I Was Too Crazy, I Became the Villain of the Entire Server!

altTitles.es-la: Me volví enemigo de todo el servidor por ser demasiado descuidado

description.en: This is an extremely difficult game. If you don’t have enough abilities, you won’t be able to escape!
description.zh: 漫画简介: 这是一个难度极其离谱的游戏，如果你没足够的能耐，村都别想出去！

title.en: The Strongest Sect of All Times

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Zang Men Yi Dian Qiang
Wǒ De Zōng Mén Yì Diǎn Qiáng

altTitles.en: My Sect Has 100 Million Strength Points
My Sect Is 100 Million Points Stronger

description.en: Wang Feng finds himself transmigrated to the Xian Lan Continent. With the help of a  powerful system, he summons mighty individuals to crush all opposition, leading his Immortal Sect to unparalleled glory.
description.zh: 穿越到仙澜大陆的王枫，通过宗门系统召唤各路高手碾压一切强敌，让自己创立的神仙宗成为万人敬仰的最强宗。

altTitles.ja: 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター

altTitles.th: มือปราบปิศาจคนสุดท้าย ENDER GEISTER

altTitles.vi: Chung Chi Thối Ma Sư -Ender Geister-

description.en:
Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. 
He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.

altTitles.zh: 力量点满？我可是亡灵法师啊！

description.en: Qiao Yu enters the world of the meta-Universe and gains the hidden class of a Necromancer. Unfortunately, his initial intelligence and spirit stats are both at 0, and he even draws a strangely unique talent. In a fit of anger, Qiao Yu puts all his attribute points into strength! Who says a Necromancer can’t engage in hand-to-hand combat? As Qiao Yu punches the World serpent, Yemojia, to death, players in the meta-Universe are driven mad. Bro, please, stop brawling! You’re a Necromancer! Just summon an undead, please!
description.zh: 乔榆进入元宇宙里世界，获得了隐藏职业亡灵法师。奈何开局智力精神都为0，还抽到了一个十分奇怪的天赋。乔榆一怒之下，属性点全部加力量！谁规定亡灵法师就不能和人肉搏的？看着一拳打死世界之蛇耶梦加得的乔榆，里世界的玩家都疯了。大哥，求求你别跟人肉搏了！你是一位亡灵法师啊！求求你召唤个亡灵吧！

description.en: "Bai Qi", an unknown game anchor, is about to reach the pinnacle of his life when he accidentally dies while streaming a game called "Soul Throne". Unexpectedly, he is reborn into the world of this high-difficulty action game. With his "T0-Level" game skills from his previous life and the blessing of the system's "100 Full-Achieved Max-Level Accounts", can Bai Qi ascend to the throne once again and become the one and only king of that world?

Jiang Chen transmigrated to the world of immortals, but he did not have any talent for cultivation and was destined to be a mortal. The one at the door? Oh,it’s just Jiang Chen’s legendary golden-winged bird.
description.zh: 江尘穿越仙侠世界，奈何没有修仙天赋，注定只能当个凡人。门口的那个？奥，只是江辰顺手抓的金翅大鹏罢了
